doc.title: Learning to Fly
doc.author: Name
doc.description: I began learning to fly in the early winter of 2008. I have not been up much lately due to the cost and events in my life, however, I will go back. I got a lot of positive response to these short eâ€¦

main.p: I began learning to fly in the early winter of 2008.
I have not been up much lately due to the cost and events in my life, however, I will go back.
I got a lot of positive response to these short essays on a pilot forum so I will share them here.
This page has the following sub pages.
